text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump Trump will lie then dash out AGAIN.
He can't answer for his incompetence.

USA has 4% of the world's population and 33% of the world's #COVID19 cases.
We also have 26% of the world's #COVIDー19 deaths.

Why?
TRUMP IS INCOMPETENT
